original_text: You shall tear down their altars and dash in pieces their pillars and burn their Asherim with fire. You shall chop down the carved images of their gods and destroy their name out of that place.
korean_text: 그 제단을 헐며 주상을 깨뜨리며 아세라 상을 불사르고 또 그 조각한 신상들을 찍어 그 이름을 그 곳에서 멸하라

sentences.original_text: You shall tear down their altars
and dash in pieces their pillars
and burn their Asherim with fire
You shall chop down the carved images of their gods
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들의 신들의 조각된 형상을 찍어 부수어라

sentences.original_text: and destroy their name out of that place
